title: Perma-Banned
body: So i got Perma banned and while I have no problem with as I do deserve it I was talking to my brother and he said he heard something about being able to get back my account. Was just wondering if someone could confirm if this is true or not

replies.body: Nope. You just admitted you deserved it, there's literally no way you will ever get that account back.
Figured, after all the work
All the work to get it banned? Yeh, that seems to have payed off.

No all the effort I put into unlocking all the champions. The reason I was banned was cause i called people out for being stupid and apparently that counts as Verbal abuse. I wouldn't mind so much if they learned that if they can't win a 1v1 then don't fight and just farm but it seems that it doesn't change in Bronze or Gold

Firstly, my comment was a cop out. I knew what you meant, I just didn't care.

Secondly, calling people out for being stupid and verbal abuse are pretty much always the same thing because people can't find a way to say it nicely, in a manner that isn't outright derogatory. Toxicity does not solve stupidity.

That's because there is no nice way to say it, and nothing solve stupidity cause stupid people are people who don't want to change or are incapable of change. Plus most of the time when i try to be polite about it i just get told to fuck off , kill myself or something else along those lines.

> That's because there is no nice way to say it

Actually there is, and you could start by not being an asshole about it.

> nothing solve stupidity cause stupid people are people who don't want to change or are incapable of change.

Well, there's this lovely little thing called "education" that has a surprising effect on stupidity. It gets rid of it. Maybe instead of just calling people stupid you could actually give then an idea of something they could do that wouldn't have been stupid.

> when i try to be polite about it

Wait, I thought you said there was no nice way to say it?

1. Ok please provide me a nice way to call someone stupid.

2. I have tried that, usually after someone gives FB only for them to completely ignore any advice i tried to give and walking imminently back to lane to try to 1v1 the guy that just kicked their ass

3. There is no nice way to call someone stupid, cause stupid is used as an insult. Saying something like "if you had done this you would have won" is different then doing something like " WTF, are you stupid, why did you just try to 3v1"

> Ok please provide me a nice way to call someone stupid.

I'm going to quote you here:

> "if you had done this you would have won"

Notice how there's no insults there? Funny how that works.

> only for them to completely ignore any advice i tried to give

So you expect **EVERY SINGLE PERSON** to take your advice? Quite the unrealistic expectation. Sure, some people are stupid by choice but I have no doubt that there are plenty of people who **HAVE** taken your advice, even if it wasn't in the game you played with them.

who the fuck has time to be nice. either way 90% of the time they'll be feeding, your opponent is farming and wont end and nobody wants to surrender because they feel like they're learning or some shit. in the end you're wasting up to and over an entire amount of another games minutes worth of time having to calmly tell these retards not to duel %%%%s that are fed or whatever cos its just making it worse.

oh but it doesnt stop there, no, they're a jax, they've got guinsoos, they think they've got late game, so no surrenderino here m8, nope. just sit on your ass as a soraka and do absolutely fuck all cos you cant even heal someone twice before they get blown up. 20-40 minutes of running around pretending to ward and care about your team but you already know the game is lost at 3-25 kills

and whats the point of all of this if they dont even take any of your kind and assertive criticism, nay, advice. you all just wasted up to 40 minutes watching the enemies farm and stall the game while your belligerent teammates are still too egotistical to surrender cos they cant tell the enemies are just fucking around laughing at their screens watching these kids walk 1 by 1 into a 3 second fight after finally completing their 1st item thinking they're strong af when in actuality, the AD darius with furor greaves, cleaver and IE can 1v5 the entire enemy team

TLDR dont read that its just me butthurt and ranting

Maybe they did take my advice after the game but what good is that to me?

 Let's use a pretty common example here, with someone who is new to GP and is having trouble landing his barrels, something I've seen a lot. So you tell them to place it in the bush first, let it tick down and then drop one on the opponent and then detonating the first so they can't dodge. 

When I tried to give simple advice like that to people who are clearly new to the champ I was either told to fuck off or just ignored. 

The one time someone listened to me on any advice was when he wanted tips on playing Akali cause I rekt him in a game as her. 

I don't expect all advice to be followed, I don't have such a stupid expectation but If they are struggling to use a champion and some fairly simple advice is given like the GP example it would at the very least be nice to see them try, instead of just doing the same thing over and over. The only reason I care is cause I mainly played rank so I would rather not lose cause someone picks a champion they have no idea how to play and doesn't communicate with the team when help is given

Unlucky with the perma ban. Which elo was it in? I'm in high plat which where you meet some of the most toxic people. But half the time it's called banter and people don't care enough to report. lately the only time I've been reporting is when people afk. Getting offended by someone in chat is silly when you have the option to mute others.
Silver and gold.
I don't think you can unlock your account but you could give a try emailing riot but tbh don't think they'll do it.
Is there any way to get their attention on the broads? It would simply be quicker to ask one directly

except there are literally 0 consequences for me being an asshole on boards as long as I don't tell someone to kill themself.
Nope, he's full of shit. Read more about it [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201898070-My-Account-is-Suspended#h1q2).

Well what about the people who just continually smack talk, provoke, stir up shit and then report you for being "toxic", intentionally feed and get away with it because you and the rest of your team gets angry so he reports them then nek minnit perma ban, after spending hundreds of dollars on a game you enjoy playing and winning at, thinking you will have a game that you put so much time into not ruined by shit stirrers (of which some are quite good) who get you banned for a mess they created?
also read the regulations link from below, which says to me "riot will be manipulated by assholes who can abuse the system to get satisfaction from getting people banned after they piss them off".
and yes i was also perma banned for similar reasons,
